ðŸ“– Summary: The GPT_Vuln-analyzer is a proof-of-concept application that leverages AI models (ChatGPT, Bard, Llama2) to automate vulnerability analysis. It integrates network scanning (Nmap), DNS enumeration, JWT analysis, and PCAP analysis to identify potential security weaknesses and generate comprehensive reports. The tool offers both a command-line interface (CLI) and a graphical user interface (GUI) for ease of use.
